Alfred Neville Lewis (1895-1972) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town, South Africa
O wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ ma, mgbe e mesịrị, na Slade School of Art na London.
Lewis, onye bụ onye isi obodo Cape Town, na 4 Ọktoba 1929, meghere Table Mountain Aerial Cableway.
Nville lụrụ Theo Townshend nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu New English Art Club na'afọ1920
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya gbasara na 1922, ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ Tom na David gara Cape Town ebe nne na nna ochie ha zụlitere ha na nwa ya nwanyị Catherine nọrọ na nwunye mbụ ya.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ na France, Belgium, na Ịtali.
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ọ gara n'ihu na-eji mmanụ emepụta foto
Ọ na-ese ndị isi ojii South Africa ugboro ugboro
Lewis sere foto atọ nke Field Marshal Bernard Law Montgomery. O dekwara ọtụtụ ndị na-etinye aka na agha site na onye otu South African Native Military Corps ruo nọọsụ
E ji ọtụtụ n'ime ihe oyiyi ndị a mee ihe maka stampụ akwụkwọ ozi n'oge agha ahụ.

Ọ lụrụ Countess Rosa Cecilie Karoline-Mathilde Irene Sibylla Anna zu Solms-Baruth, nwa nwanyị Friedrich, 3rd Prince of Solms- Baruth na nwunye ya Princess Adelaide of Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg, na 3 Nọvemba 1955 wee biri na Rowan Street, Stellenbosch ebe ụmụ ha Caroline na Frederick Henry Lewis gara akwụkwọ.
Mgbe e mesịrị, di na nwunye ahụ nwetara obere ụlọ n'ihu Stellenbosch Golf Club ebe nwunye ya na ụmụ ya nwere ike ịchụso ịhụnanya ha maka ịgba ịnyịnya
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'afọ 1972 nwunye ya lụrụ Weber.
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe gbara ihe osise Portrait of Albert van der Sandt Centlivres nke Lewis ọkụ n'oge ọgba aghara Rhodes Must Fall na Mahadum Cape Town na Febụwarị 2016.
